bike.description: New 2013 Frame Design, Lightweight 6066 Aluminum Floval Tubing, Internally-machined Integrated Head Tube, 3D-Forged Dropouts

components.description: Full Cr-Mo Landing Gear, Tapered Legs
180mm Forged Alloy 2-pc w/ Alloy 44T Chain Ring, Integrated Sealed External BB, Hollow Axle
X-Pedo Low-profile Platform w/ Removable Pins
Sealed Bearing Hollow Axle Alloy Hubs w/ Alex Supra BH20 32H F & DM22 36H R, Double-wall Rims, 16T Cassette, Stainless Spokes
Tektro BX-310 Alloy V-Brake, Slick Cable
SE Top-Load Alloy, Lightweight External Cutouts, Hidden Top Cap
SE Racing Wing Grip w/ SE Rubber End Plugs
